stimulus.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that helps a process to develop more quickly or more strongly
stimulus.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Tax cuts provided the stimulus which the slow economy needed.
The discovery of oil acted as a stimulus to industrial development.
stimulus.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that makes someone or something move or react
stimulus.translation[0].definitions[1].e: At this age, the infant begins to react more to visual stimuli.
stimulus.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something that helps a process to develop more quickly or strongly
stimulus.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The discovery of oil acted as a stimulus to the local economy.
